Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
leaders \leaders\ n. the body of people who lead a group; the leadership[3]; as, they hung the leaders of the insurrection.
Syn: leadership. [WordNet 1.5]
leaders n : the body of people who lead a group; "the national leadership adopted his plan" [syn: {leadership}]
